name: Dark Times
description:
"Dark Times" is made for Trijam #51 (3 hour game jam) 

 theme  " Who is the enemy? "

Controls : Mouse 

It's a simple Endless Tower Defense game witch take place in medieval  ages where you  are gifted with incredible power. For that reason everyone wants  your services. The task is to keep the Kingdom treasury full at all cost.  Art is original, music and sfx are from freesound.org and opengameart.org
